content: Before you check up the hill from the Shrine, head back across the bridge and follow the path down to the brook itself.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Brook of Bliss'.
The content is as follows:
Before you check up the hill from the Shrine, head back across the bridge and follow the path down to the brook itself.
